# Live-Sync Classroom - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
A real-time collaborative workspace where users can create sticky notes, manage tasks, and collaborate on projects with instant synchronization.

## Tech Stack
- Frontend: React with TypeScript
- Backend: Node.js/Express with Socket.io
- Database: MongoDB for persistent storage
- Real-time: Socket.io for WebSocket connections

## Key Features
- Real-time collaborative sticky note wall
- Drag-and-drop interface
- Visual connections between notes
- Share links for collaboration
- Project and task management
- Instant synchronization across all users

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow React best practices
- Implement proper WebSocket error handling
- Ensure data persistence
- Optimize for real-time performance
